
            <h1 class="postTitle">
                <a id="cb_post_title_url" class="postTitle2 vertical-middle" href="https://www.cnblogs.com/xiaozhi_5638/p/18632382" title="发布于 2024-12-26 11:44">
    <span role="heading" aria-level="2">01现代计算机视觉入门之：什么是图片</span>
    

</a>

            </h1>
            <div class="clear"></div>
            <div class="postBody">
                <div id="cnblogs_post_body" class="blogpost-body blogpost-body-html">
<p>## 系列文章目录 ##</p>
<p><strong>01现代计算机视觉入门之：什么是图片（6700字/25图）</strong></p>
<p>02现代计算机视觉入门之：什么是视频</p>
<p>03现代计算机视觉入门之：什么是图片特征编码</p>
<p>04现代计算机视觉入门之：什么是图片分类</p>
<p>05现代计算机视觉入门之：什么是目标检测</p>
<p>06现代计算机视觉入门之：什么是图像分割</p>
<p>07现代计算机视觉入门之：什么是图片生成</p>
<p>08现代计算机视觉入门之：什么硬件加速</p>
<p><a href="http://www.videopipe.cool/" target="_blank" rel="noopener nofollow">访问完整序列文章（更新中）</a></p>
<p>本文中的图片主要指光栅图片，而非矢量图片。光栅图片也是我们日常最常见的图片类型，智能手机拍照、监控摄像机、屏幕截图、社交网络图片等等都是光栅图片，它主要由成千上万个像素组成，也是计算机视觉（包括传统和现代）领域中图像算法处理的主要图片类型。</p>
<p><strong>像素和分辨率</strong></p>
<p><span style="font-family: 宋体">图片是一个有限二维平面，平面由纵横交叉的像素组成，类似一个二维表格，有明确的像素宽度（</span><span style="font-family: Calibri">W</span><span style="font-family: 宋体">）和像素高度（</span><span style="font-family: Calibri">H</span><span style="font-family: 宋体">），每个像素有自己的颜色，如白色、黑色、红色等等，密密麻麻的像素拼接成图片中各种各样的物体，它们有不同的形状、不同颜色。</span></p>
<p><span style="font-family: 宋体"><img src="https://img2024.cnblogs.com/blog/104032/202412/104032-20241226114129744-708247983.png" alt=""></span></p>
<p><span style="font-family: 宋体">图片中的像素由</span><span style="font-family: Calibri">bit</span><span style="font-family: 宋体">位来表示，如果每个像素由</span><span style="font-family: Calibri">1</span><span style="font-family: 宋体">个</span><span style="font-family: Calibri">bit</span><span style="font-family: 宋体">位表示的话，那么像素只能有</span><span style="font-family: Calibri">2</span><span style="font-family: 宋体">种颜色（比如</span><span style="font-family: Calibri">0</span><span style="font-family: 宋体">表示黑色，</span><span style="font-family: Calibri">1</span><span style="font-family: 宋体">表示白色），传统图像算法中有很多二值图每个像素由</span><span style="font-family: Calibri">1</span><span style="font-family: 宋体">个</span><span style="font-family: Calibri">bit</span><span style="font-family: 宋体">位表示，只有黑白两种颜色。同样的，如果每个像素由</span><span style="font-family: Calibri">2</span><span style="font-family: 宋体">个</span><span style="font-family: Calibri">bit</span><span style="font-family: 宋体">位表示的话，那么像素可以有</span><span style="font-family: Calibri">4</span><span style="font-family: 宋体">种颜色（</span><span style="font-family: Calibri">00</span><span style="font-family: 宋体">，</span><span style="font-family: Calibri">01</span><span style="font-family: 宋体">，</span><span style="font-family: Calibri">10</span><span style="font-family: 宋体">，</span><span style="font-family: Calibri">11</span><span style="font-family: 宋体">），以此类推。由此可见，</span><span style="font-family: Calibri">bit</span><span style="font-family: 宋体">位数越大，像素颜色种类越多。</span></p>
<p><span style="font-family: 宋体"><img src="https://img2024.cnblogs.com/blog/104032/202412/104032-20241226114138284-1309107926.png" alt=""></span></p>
<p>&nbsp;<span style="font-family: 宋体">图片的像素宽度</span><span style="font-family: Calibri">W*</span><span style="font-family: 宋体">像素高度</span><span style="font-family: Calibri">H</span><span style="font-family: 宋体">等于该图片包含的总像素数量，一般我们我们常说的</span><span style="font-family: Calibri">500</span><span style="font-family: 宋体">万像素、</span><span style="font-family: Calibri">1200</span><span style="font-family: 宋体">万像素就是用像素宽度</span><span style="font-family: Calibri">W*</span><span style="font-family: 宋体">像素高度</span><span style="font-family: Calibri">H</span><span style="font-family: 宋体">得到的结果，这个也称为图片分辨率。常见的分辨率有以下几种（各种场合定义可能有差别）：</span></p>
<p><span style="font-family: Calibri">1</span><span style="font-family: 宋体">、</span><span style="font-family: 宋体">标清。</span> <span style="font-family: Calibri">720 </span><span style="font-family: 宋体">× </span><span style="font-family: Calibri">576</span><span style="font-family: 宋体">，约</span><span style="font-family: Calibri">40</span><span style="font-family: 宋体">万像素</span></p>
<p><span style="font-family: Calibri">2</span><span style="font-family: 宋体">、准高清（</span><span style="font-family: Calibri">720P</span><span style="font-family: 宋体">）。</span><span style="font-family: Calibri">1280 </span><span style="font-family: 宋体">× </span><span style="font-family: Calibri">720</span><span style="font-family: 宋体">，约</span><span style="font-family: Calibri">90</span><span style="font-family: 宋体">万像素</span></p>
<p><span style="font-family: Calibri">3</span><span style="font-family: 宋体">、全高清（</span><span style="font-family: Calibri">1080P</span><span style="font-family: 宋体">）。</span><span style="font-family: Calibri">1920 </span><span style="font-family: 宋体">× </span><span style="font-family: Calibri">1080</span><span style="font-family: 宋体">，约</span><span style="font-family: Calibri">200</span><span style="font-family: 宋体">万像素</span></p>
<p><span style="font-family: Calibri">4</span><span style="font-family: 宋体">、</span><span style="font-family: Calibri">2K</span><span style="font-family: 宋体">。</span><span style="font-family: Calibri">2048 </span><span style="font-family: 宋体">× </span><span style="font-family: Calibri">1080</span><span style="font-family: 宋体">，约</span><span style="font-family: Calibri">200</span><span style="font-family: 宋体">万像素</span></p>
<p><span style="font-family: Calibri">5</span><span style="font-family: 宋体">、</span><span style="font-family: Calibri">4K</span><span style="font-family: 宋体">。</span><span style="font-family: Calibri">3840 </span><span style="font-family: 宋体">× </span><span style="font-family: Calibri">2160</span><span style="font-family: 宋体">，约</span><span style="font-family: Calibri">800</span><span style="font-family: 宋体">万像素</span></p>
<p><span style="font-family: Calibri">6</span><span style="font-family: 宋体">、</span><span style="font-family: Calibri">8K</span><span style="font-family: 宋体">。</span><span style="font-family: Calibri">7680 </span><span style="font-family: 宋体">× </span><span style="font-family: Calibri">4320</span><span style="font-family: 宋体">，约</span><span style="font-family: Calibri">3200</span><span style="font-family: 宋体">万像素</span></p>
<p>&nbsp;<span style="font-family: 宋体">一般情况下，分辨率越大的图片，清晰度也越高。可以设想一下，用</span><span style="font-family: Calibri">1000</span><span style="font-family: 宋体">个像素拼成的目标肯定要比用</span><span style="font-family: Calibri">100</span><span style="font-family: 宋体">个像素拼成的目标细节更丰富、画面更清晰。注意这里的“一般情况”，图片清晰度跟成像设备也有很大关系，分辨率越高图片越清晰只是粗略说法。</span></p>
<p><span style="font-family: 宋体">（以下为图片格式版本）</span></p>
<p><span style="font-family: 宋体"><img src="https://img2024.cnblogs.com/blog/104032/202412/104032-20241226114158774-1134071309.png" alt="" width="915" height="15274"></span></p>
<p>&nbsp;</p>
</div>
<div class="clear"></div>
